statements: DELETE FROM government_agencies WHERE transparency_compliance = true;
DELETE FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 100 AND transparency_compliance = TRUE;
DELETE FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_name = 'Department of Health' OR public_records IS NULL;
DELETE FROM public_records WHERE record_id = 100 AND agency_name = 'Police Department';
DELETE FROM government_agencies WHERE location = 'Washington D.C.';
DELETE FROM agencies WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM officials WHERE agency_id = (SELECT id FROM agencies WHERE city = 'New York')
